summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Timekettle drops W4 AI Interpreter Earbuds with bone conduction for better accuracy in loud spots.
• These bad boys are wireless, real-time translation machines available in navy blue and sandy gold.
• Priced at $349, they’re a cheaper, sleeker alternative to the over-ear W4 Pro.

Impact — Timekettle’s W4 earbuds are here to make real-time translation more accessible and stylish than ever.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.theverge.com/news/771665/timekettle-w4-ai-interpreter-wireless-earbuds-bone-conduction
